content.rendered:
Welcome to ASULV’s E-Board and Senators for the 2024-2025 year!

Executive Board

  • President: Julia Thomas
  • Executive Vice President: Evan Lyons
  • Vice President of Communications: Myrna Abarca
  • Vice President of Finance: Connie Soe
  • Vice President of Marketing: Victoria Cardenas
  • Senator Pro Tempore: Lilly Dyer

College Senators

  • Senator of Arts and Sciences: Audrie Pagano
  • Senator of Arts and Sciences: Gabriel Palacios
  • Senator of Business: Yahir Navarro
  • Senator of Health: Mallely Caceres
  • Senator of Education: Kaiden Olmos

Senators at Large

  • Jessica Molina
  • Kat Do
  • Lauren Stratton
  • Jayleen De La Cruz
